{"step_by_step_thinking": "From Document [0], it is clear that the secretion of prolactin is under the main inhibitory control of hypothalamic dopamine. Also, the secretion of growth hormone is controlled by hypothalamic hormones, somatotropin releasing factor and somatotropin release-inhibiting factor. Therefore, both prolactin and growth hormone are under inhibitory control of the hypothalamus.", "answer_choice": "D. Both Prolactin and Growth hormone"}
